thread.title: BRIEF-KBR Acquires Carillion's Aspire Defence Interests, Reaffirms Commitment To Long-Term Stability Of Program

title: BRIEF-KBR Acquires Carillion's Aspire Defence Interests, Reaffirms Commitment To Long-Term Stability Of Program

organizations.name: reaffirms commitment to long-term stability of program reuters

text:
April 19, 2018 / 10:01 AM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-KBR Acquires Carillion's Aspire Defence Interests, Reaffirms Commitment To Long-Term Stability Of Program Reuters Staff 
April 19 (Reuters) - KBR Inc: 
* KBR ACQUIRES CARILLION’S ASPIRE DEFENCE INTERESTS, REAFFIRMS COMMITMENT TO LONG-TERM STABILITY OF PROGRAM 
* KBR INC - IMPACT TO KBR’S EARNINGS AND CASH FLOWS HAS ALREADY BEEN INCLUDED IN 2018 GUIDANCE ISSUED ON FEBRUARY 23, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
